arts.ttl: Full Unai Emery press conference as Aston Villa boss agrees about big positive after Man United draw
arts.sum: I think it is hamstring, but I don’t know if it’s a big or small injury. Players with small injuries, they should be available again like Onana and Ramsey."

arts.ttl: Morgan Rogers sums up the gap between Aston Villa and Man United right now, writes TOM COLLOMOSSE - the Red Devils are now lagging behind both on AND off the pitch
arts.sum: TOM COLLOMOSSE: Nassef Sawiris would love Aston Villa to keep the tills ringing like United yet Ratcliffe would probably sacrifice millions in revenue to match their rivals' on the pitch.

arts.ttl: Konsa and Gibbs-White injury doubts for England
arts.sum: Aston Villa defender Ezri Konsa and Nottingham Forest midfielder Morgan Gibbs-White are doubts for England duty through injury.

arts.ttl: Every Aston Villa and Man United player should be 'ashamed' after bore draw
arts.sum: Former Manchester United striker Dimitar Berbatov says that 'everybody on the pitch should be ashamed' after the Red Devils drew 0-0 with Aston Villa in a dull draw which saw United veteran defender Jonny Evans be awarded the man of the match award. Join our Aston Villa WhatsApp group and get the latest breaking news, interviews and opinion sent straight to your phone, plus matchday team news and live updates of all the action.

arts.ttl: Ezri Konsa emerges as England doubt as Unai Emery provides injury update
arts.sum: Konsa suffered a hamstring issue against Manchester United three days after being named in Lee Carsley’s squad

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 0-0 Manchester United: Unai Emery content with Premier League draw after exhausting schedule
arts.sum: Aston Villa head coach Unai Emery admits that he can have few complaints with his side's goalless draw with Manchester United after their recent exhausting schedule.

arts.ttl: Emery admits Aston Villa lacked ‘energy’ in Man United draw
arts.sum: Unai Emery admits Aston Villa’s exploits in midweek meant his side lacked ‘energy’ during their goalless draw with Manchester United. The two teams played out a forgettable stalemate at Villa Park on Sunday, a performance and atmosphere in contrast to the 1-0 win over Bayern Munich in the Champions League this week. Villa suffered […] The post Emery admits Aston Villa lacked ‘energy’ in Man United draw first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 0-0 Man United player ratings: Jonny Evans rolls back the years as Marcus Rashford struggles
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at how the players performed during Aston Villa's goalless draw with Manchester United in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: 'Man Utd should be down to 10-men' | Rashford lucky to avoid red against Villa?
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford received an initial yellow for a tackle on Matty Cash before making a similar tackle to give away a free-kick, which Jamie Carragher says should've been a second yellow.

arts.ttl: John Townley's Aston Villa player ratings after 0-0 stalemate with Man United
arts.sum: Emi Martinez batted away an effort from Marcus Rashford early on, while Morgan Rogers pulled a strike wide from the edge of the box, but Villa didn’t register a shot on target. Villa suffered an injury blow in the 12th minute when Ezri Konsa came off with what looked like a muscular injury and was replaced by Diego Carlos.
